name: Udyr
title: the Spirit Walker
lore: Udyr is more than a man; he is a vessel for the untamed power of four primal animal spirits. When tapping into the spirits' bestial natures, Udyr can harness their unique strengths: The tiger grants him speed and ferocity, the turtle resilience, the bear might, and the phoenix its eternal flame. With their combined power, Udyr can turn back all those who would attempt to harm the natural order.
blurb: Udyr is more than a man; he is a vessel for the untamed power of four primal animal spirits. When tapping into the spirits' bestial natures, Udyr can harness their unique strengths: The tiger grants him speed and ferocity, the turtle resilience, the...
allytips: Damage is applied to turtle shield post-mitigation. Therefore, buying defensive items can drastically increase your survivability.
Udyr is one of the best junglers in the game. Taking advantage of this can give your team a large XP advantage and map control.
enemytips: Udyr players will often start in the jungle and only appear to gank in lanes. Try warding key locations to keep track of his movement.
Once the initial shield effect has faded, Turtle Stance is weak against other champions. Press the attack to force him to switch stances and prevent him from regenerating health.
Some Udyr players buy tank items to become very durable. If they do, focus their weaker teammates instead.

riot_spells.name: Tiger Stance
riot_spells.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will perform a Tiger Strike, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds.

If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Turtle Stance
riot_spells.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e3 }}% of his maximum health), increasing by 1% for every percent of Udyr's missing health.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e2 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Bear Stance
riot_spells.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for {{ e3 }} second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Phoenix Stance
riot_spells.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing {{ totalconedamage }} magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ totalaoedamagepertick }} magic damage each second to nearby enemies for {{ phoenixaoeduration }} seconds.

riot_passive.name: Monkey's Agility
riot_passive.description: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.

i1.name: Monkey's Agility
i1.blurb: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|5 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|{{as|10% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds every time he uses an ability, stacking up to 3 times, up to a maximum of {{sti|ms|{{as|15 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|{{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Four Stances:}} '''Udyr''' has no [[Champion ability|ultimate ability]] and instead has 4 [[Champion ability|basic abilities]]. Each of his abilities provides a passive effect that lasts until he activates a different ability, called his current ''Stance''. Activating any of his abilities will prevent his previous ''Stance'' from triggering any more on-hit effects, and will prevent him from activating another ability for 2 seconds.
i1.description3: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.
i1.notes:
* Further stance activations at maximum stacks of ''Monkey's Agility'' will refresh the timer.
* Despite having 4 abilities each with 6 ranks, '''Udyr''' is not able to level beyond the usual limit under normal circumstances - meaning he must choose how to allocate his points and will not be able to reach maximum rank on each of his abilities, unless with the use of {{ii|Elixir of Skill}} from {{ri|Kleptomancy}}, or in the featured game mode, {{tip|Ultra Rapid Fire}}.
** {{ii|Elixir of Skill}} grants the additional point only if it's used before level 18.

q1.name: Tiger Stance
q1.blurb: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
q1.description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' [[basic attack]]s generate ''Tiger'' stacks [[attack effects|on-hit]], up to 3. At 3 stacks, '''Udyr's''' next basic attack is a ''Tiger Strike'', which deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} over 2 seconds as well as instantly dealing any remaining damage from any previous ''Tiger Strikes''.
q1.leveling: {{st|Total Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 180 6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110 to 185 6}}% AD)}}|Damage Per Half-Second|{{ap|30/4 to 180/4 6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|110/4 to 185/4 6}}% AD)}}}}
q1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Tiger Speed:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 ''Tiger'' stacks.
q1.notes:
* The damage dealt by Tiger Strike is classified as ability damage, which is unusual for on-hit effects.
* The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.
* ''Tiger Stance's'' primed DoT does not persist through stance changes.
* The triggering attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can [[critical strike|critically strike]] as normal.
** Unlike most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from ''Tiger Stance'' will not apply [[life steal]].
** Critical strikes do not interact with the bonus damage from ''Tiger Stance''.
** The persistent on-hit physical damage can successfully be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} and {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}.
*** However, they do not prevent application of the active DoT.
** If '''Udyr''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, neither the persistent damage nor the active damage will be applied, and it will consume the empowered attack of the active.

w1.name: Turtle Stance
w1.blurb: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.
w1.description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks generate ''Turtle'' stacks on-hit, up to 3. At 3 stacks, '''Udyr's''' next basic attack {{tip|heal|heals}} him for {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|11|type='''missing''' health|key=%|2.5 to 5|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=2.5% increased by 1% per 1% of '''missing''' health}} of his '''maximum''' health|health}}}}.
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Spiritual Shell:}} '''Udyr''' {{tip|shields}} himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 ''Turtle'' stacks.
w1.notes: * The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.

e1.name: Bear Stance
e1.blurb: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
e1.description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks {{tip|stun}} his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
e1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Primal Charge:}} '''Udyr''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and is {{tip|ghosted}} for the next few seconds. Additionally, his next basic attack gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and causes him to {{tip|lunge|leap}} to his target.
e1.leveling2:
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|15 to 40 6}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed Duration|{{ap|2 to 3.25 6}}}}
e1.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|This is not affected by cooldown reduction, and only applies for the persistent effect.}}
e1.notes:
* ''Bear Stance's'' self-displacement does '''not''' count as a [[dash]] for the purposes of {{ri|Sudden Impact}}.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can [[critical strike|critically strike]] as normal.
* ''Bear Stance's'' stun does not interact with structures.
* If the enhanced autoattack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} or {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} or Udyr is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, the target will not be stunned nor receive any damage.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability and incur the 5 second stun immunity.

r1.name: Phoenix Stance
r1.blurb: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
r1.description: {{sbc|Stance:}} '''Udyr's''' basic attacks generate ''Phoenix'' stacks on-hit, up to 3. At 3 stacks, '''Udyr's''' next basic attack unleashes fire in a cone in front of him that deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies hit.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Active - Phoenix Flame:}} '''Udyr''' unleashes pulsing waves of fire around himself for 4 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to all nearby enemies for the duration, as well as instantly generating 3 ''Phoenix'' stacks.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|10*4 to 60*4 6}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|10 to 60 6}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
r1.notes: * The triggering attack will generate the first stack toward the next, meaning the effect will always trigger on every 3rd attack. {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} will reduce this number to every 2nd attack, with '''Udyr's''' attack animations coded to "look ahead" and trigger the empowered-attack animation if he attacks a target while at 1 stack while ''Guinsoo's Rage'' is active.
